select icr.id, icr.shop_sku_id, icr.inventory_quantity_old, icr.inventory_quantity_new, icr.modified_quantity, icr. change_type, icr.entity_id, icr.remark, icr.create_time, icr.create_by, icr.update_time, icr.update_by ,s.shop_name,u.real_name createByRealName,ss.shop_sku, case change_type when 1 then (select batch_number from warehousing_order wo where wo.id=icr.main_entity_id) when 2 then (select batch_number from check_order co where co.id=icr.main_entity_id) when 4 then (select batch_number from transfer_order tod where tod.id=icr.main_entity_id) when 5 then (select batch_number from transfer_order tod where tod.id=icr.main_entity_id) when 3 then (select batch_number from outbound_order oo where oo.id=icr.main_entity_id) end batch_number from inventory_change_record icr left JOIN shop_sku ss on icr.shop_sku_id=ss.shop_sku_id left JOIN shop s on ss.shop_id=s.shop_id left join `user` u on u.user_id=icr.create_by
and s.shop_id =#{shopId} and create_time>= #{createTimeStart} and create_time < DATE_ADD(date(#{createTimeEnd}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
and ss.shop_sku like concat('%',#{shopSku},'%')
and create_by=#{createBy}
order by icr.create_time desc
